name: Souvlaki Sheet Pan Dinner
description: Simplify your life, sheet pan style! This is all the vibrant, Greek flavours of souvlaki, conveniently packed into a single pan for minimal effort and maximum satisfaction. Dinner in a pan, my friends: it’s the meal solution you’ve been looking for.

ingredients.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning or Donair Seasoning

preparation: Meanwhile, in a bowl, whisk together seasoning, vinegar, and oil.
Drain and rinse chickpeas; place on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Add chicken, tomatoes, and green beans. They will overlap—that’s OK. Drizzle sauce on top; gently toss to combine.
Bake 15 min, or until chicken is cooked through, beans are tender-crisp, and some of the tomatoes have burst.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 small pita and 2 tbsp Lemon Dilly Dip.

products.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: A Greek-inspired meal, souvlaki is marinated meat grilled on a skewer, often served with warm pita bread and tzatziki. No grill? No problem. Skip the skewers and put your Sheet Pan to work to make equally tasty Chicken Souvlaki in 20 minutes in the oven.

products.name: Donair Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Any way you name it – gyro, shawarma, donair, or doner kebab – our Donair Seasoning is what you’re looking for. You won’t believe how easy it is to make the street food staple at home in minutes with this blend and a few simple ingredients. Just add the seasoning to ground beef, press it into a Rectangular Steamer and cook it in the microwave for 10 minutes or the oven for 60. Slice thinly and serve on a pita with fresh veggies and tzatziki – dinner is done!

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
